Cancer Types: All Solid Tumors (excluding Thyroid Cancer, Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer)

Alterations: Oncogenic Mutations (excluding C420R, E542K, E545A, E545D, E545G, E545K, Q546E, Q546R, H1047L, H1047R and H1047Y)

Drugs (for therapeutic implications only: LOXO-783 + Fulvestrant, LOXO-783 + Fulvestrant + Abemaciclib, LOXO-783 + LY3484356, LOXO-783 + LY3484356 + Abemaciclib, LOXO-783 + Aromatase Inhibition Therapy + Abemaciclib, LOXO-783 + Paclitaxel
